original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i dam pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs shing 'jug la /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa'i rjes su chags pa'i dam pa'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs shing 'jug la /
translated: After the union of method and wisdom, the sound of the sacred passion summons all the tathagatas and they enter.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi mes bzhus la /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes kyi mes bzhus la /
translated: The fire of wisdom, which is the nature of great passion, melts them.

original: thig le'i gzugs su dmigs la de nyid yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi nang na lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i 'khor lo cig car du bsams la /
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs su dmigs la de nyid yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi nang na lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i 'khor lo cig car du bsams la /
translated: Visualize the form of the drop. Within that, which is the size of a mustard seed, the entire mandala circle of thirty-two deities is simultaneously visualized.

original: de rnams kyi thugs kar yang ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dag bsgoms la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi thugs kar yang ye shes sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dag bsgoms la /
translated: At the heart of those, the awareness beings and concentration beings are meditated on.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i yig 'bru'i thig ler yang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'am /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i yig 'bru'i thig ler yang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'am /
translated: Within the drop of the awareness being‚Äôs syllable, the entire mandala circle of thirty-two is also visualized.

original: gsang ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsams la sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa spangs nas /
analyzed: gsang ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsams la sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa spangs nas /
translated: Having imagined the great mandala of the five secrets, one should abandon the concepts of both sentient beings and the world of the environment.

original: gam na gnas pa'i sgra la sogs pa mi zin pas bsgom pa la dbang bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang po kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro zhing des sems can gyi khams sbyangs te slar yang bsdus la de nyid du zhugs te /
analyzed: gam na gnas pa'i sgra la sogs pa mi zin pas bsgom pa la dbang bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang po kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro zhing des sems can gyi khams sbyangs te slar yang bsdus la de nyid du zhugs te /
translated: Since one does not grasp the sounds, etc., that are present nearby, in order to generate power in meditation, one emanates the wheel of light rays of five colors and purifies the realms of sentient beings with it.

original: de nas rang gi rigs dang rdo rjes su mthun pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa spro zhing nam mkha'i khams khyab la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi rigs dang rdo rjes su mthun pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa spro zhing nam mkha'i khams khyab la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas te /
translated: Then, one emanates the vajra, etc., that are in harmony with one‚Äôs family and the vajra, and so on, pervades the realm of space. The host of light rays that arise from that perform benefits for all migrators.

original: slar yang bsdu zhing de nyid du 'jug par byas la de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya chen po'i sku yang spros te /
analyzed: slar yang bsdu zhing de nyid du 'jug par byas la de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya chen po'i sku yang spros te /
translated: Again, one gathers them and causes them to enter into that. Then, one emanates the body of the great seal of the five tathagatas, such as Vairocana, and so on.

original: 'gro ba'i don bya ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don bya ba de ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of meditation on the subtle yoga of a yogin of Great Vajradhara for the sake of migrating beings.

original: sku rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas spyan ma'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du /
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas spyan ma'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du /
translated: A yogin of Body Vajra, in the dharma source of BuddhalocanƒÅ,

original: yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan bsgoms la de'i lte bar snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan bsgoms la de'i lte bar snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: meditates on a wheel hand implement the size of a mustard seed.

original: brten pa'i rtags mthong nas spro ba dang bsdu bas sku rdo rje'i rigs kyis 'gro ba'i 'don byas te /
analyzed: brten pa'i rtags mthong nas spro ba dang bsdu bas sku rdo rje'i rigs kyis 'gro ba'i 'don byas te /
translated: Having seen the signs of stability, he emanates and reabsorbs, purifying the world with the Body Vajra family.

original: sku rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of meditation on the subtle yoga of a yogin of Body Vajra.

original: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i @181a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i @181a * //
translated: Similarly, a yogin of Speech Vajra

original: rnal 'byor pas gos dkar mo'i chos 'byung gi nang du tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi padma dmar po bsams la de'i lte bar snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas gos dkar mo'i chos 'byung gi nang du tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi padma dmar po bsams la de'i lte bar snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams te /
translated: in the dharma source of PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´, meditates on a red lotus the size of a finger joint.

original: brtan pa'i rtags mthong zhing gsung rdo rje'i lha'i rigs spro ba dang bsdu bar bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa'i rtags mthong zhing gsung rdo rje'i lha'i rigs spro ba dang bsdu bar bya ba ni gsung rdo rje'i rigs kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The yoga of the subtle of a vajra speech yogin is the stage of meditation on the emanation and withdrawal of the deities of the vajra speech family, seeing the signs of stability.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas m'a ma k'i'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du kha dog ser po tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi zur drug pa'i rin po che bsgoms la /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas m'a ma k'i'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du kha dog ser po tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi zur drug pa'i rin po che bsgoms la /
translated: A ratnasambhava yogin meditates on a jewel the size of a canary seed, six-sided, and yellow in color, inside the phenomena source of Mamaki.

original: de'i chang zung la snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: de'i chang zung la snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: In its handle, he imagines himself as before.

original: brtan pa'i rtags mthong bas rin po che'i rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa'i rtags mthong bas rin po che'i rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The yoga of the subtle of a ratnasambhava yogin is the stage of meditation on the emanation and withdrawal of the deities of the jewel family, seeing the signs of stability.

original: dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sgrol ma'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshod tsam gyi ral gri bsgoms la /
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas sgrol ma'i chos 'byung ba'i nang du yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshod tsam gyi ral gri bsgoms la /
translated: A vajra commitment yogin meditates on a sword the size of a mustard seed inside the phenomena source of Tara.

original: de'i chang zung du snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams te brtan pa'i rtags mthong zhing dam tshig gi rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de'i chang zung du snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid bsams te brtan pa'i rtags mthong zhing dam tshig gi rigs kyi lha rnams spro ba dang bsdu bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: In the two side-channels, one should imagine oneself as before, and see the signs of stability, and emanate and reabsorb the pledge beings of the pledge deities. This is the stage of meditation on the subtle yoga of the vajra-yogin.

original: des ni rigs drug gi rjes su 'brang ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
analyzed: des ni rigs drug gi rjes su 'brang ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
translated: This teaches the subtle yoga of the six families.

original: phra mo'i rnal 'byor des kyang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang de la slob ma gzhug pa dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin rnams pha rol la ston pa dang / sngags kyi theg pa bshad pa'i phyir mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa la lung ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor des kyang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang de la slob ma gzhug pa dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin rnams pha rol la ston pa dang / sngags kyi theg pa bshad pa'i phyir mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa la lung ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that subtle yoga, the Blessed Ones, the Tathagatas dwelling in the buddha-fields of Abhirati and so forth, will prophesy the yogin, in order to draw mandalas, to induct disciples into them, to teach mantras, seals, and samadhis to others, and to explain the Mantra Vehicle.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the subtle yoga of the completion stage,

original: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te zhes smos pa la /
analyzed: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te zhes smos pa la /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe relative awakening mind,‚Äù

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i shu kra'i thig le'i gzugs so //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i shu kra'i thig le'i gzugs so //
translated: which is the form of the bindu of seminal essence that arises from the union of method and wisdom.

original: yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam zhes bya ba 'dis shin tu phra ba nyid bstan to //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam zhes bya ba 'dis shin tu phra ba nyid bstan to //
translated: ‚ÄúThe size of a mustard seed‚Äù teaches its subtlety.

original: rang gi rdo rje'i khar zhes pa ni rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i bu ga la'o //
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje'i khar zhes pa ni rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i bu ga la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the opening of one‚Äôs vajra‚Äù means in the opening of one‚Äôs secret vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byas la zhes pa ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin dang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid du byas la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid du byas la zhes pa ni 'byung ba chen po lnga'i rang bzhin dang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid du byas la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving made it the nature of the five thus-gone ones‚Äù means having made it the nature of the five great elements and the five wisdoms.

original: de la de'i sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so //
analyzed: de la de'i sra ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams so //
translated: Among them, its solidity is the earth element.

original: de'i gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so //
analyzed: de'i gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so //
translated: Its wetness is the water element.

original: de'i dro ba'i @181b mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so //
analyzed: de'i dro ba'i @181b mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so //
translated: Its heat is the fire element.

original: de'i 'gro ba dang ldog pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: de'i 'gro ba dang ldog pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi khams so //
translated: The characteristic of its going and coming, and so on, is the wind constituent.

original: de'i nang na khyab pa'i bde ba chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: de'i nang na khyab pa'i bde ba chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi khyad par gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: The special pristine awareness of the realm of phenomena, the great bliss pervading that, is the space constituent.

original: de bzhin du dag pa kun da dang zla ba dang 'dra ba'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du dag pa kun da dang zla ba dang 'dra ba'i gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul gang yin pa de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Similarly, the way in which it is the nature of clarity, like a pure jasmine or moon, is mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: de bzhin du de'i khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi sdud par byed pa'i khams drug gi tshul gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i khams nyi shu rtsa bzhi sdud par byed pa'i khams drug gi tshul gang yin pa de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: Similarly, the way in which it is the six constituents that gather the twenty-four constituents is the pristine awareness of equality.

original: de'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The conduct of that, which has the characteristic of being nonconceptual, is discerning pristine awareness.

original: de bzhin du de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bas sems can gyi don rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs spro bas sems can gyi don rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Likewise, the perfection of the welfare of sentient beings by the emission of the mass of its light rays is the wisdom of successful action.

original: de bzhin du de'i rtag pa dri ma med pa zag pa med pa'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i rtag pa dri ma med pa zag pa med pa'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid can gyi don dam pa byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Likewise, the ultimate mind of enlightenment, whose nature is the essence of the stainless, uncontaminated Dharma Body, which is characterized by its permanence, is the wisdom of the extremely pure Dharma realm.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni cho ga 'di yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni cho ga 'di yin te /
translated: The procedure as explained is as follows:

original: dang por rdo rje dang padma'i gnas dang po stong pa nyid du bsgoms la //
analyzed: dang por rdo rje dang padma'i gnas dang po stong pa nyid du bsgoms la //
translated: First, one meditates on the place of the vajra and lotus as emptiness.

original: de nas h'um a'a: sa bon gnyis yongs su gyur pa las rtse lnga pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje dang padma 'dab ma brgyad pa yang bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas h'um a'a: sa bon gnyis yongs su gyur pa las rtse lnga pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje dang padma 'dab ma brgyad pa yang bsgoms la /
translated: Then, one meditates on the secret vajra with five points and the eight-petaled lotus, which arise from the transformation of the two seed syllables, h≈´·πÉ and ƒÅ·∏•.

original: de dag gi rtse mor tshad gcad pa'i don du h'um dang phat bkod cing rin chen 'byung ldan dang / don yod grub pa'i sngags dag gis rdo rje dang padma sbyor zhing bskyed par bya ste rjes su chags pa'i mchog gi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa bkug cing 'jug la bdun khri nyis stong gi rtsa nas chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi sems dbu ma'i lam
analyzed: de dag gi rtse mor tshad gcad pa'i don du h'um dang phat bkod cing rin chen 'byung ldan dang / don yod grub pa'i sngags dag gis rdo rje dang padma sbyor zhing bskyed par bya ste rjes su chags pa'i mchog gi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa bkug cing 'jug la bdun khri nyis stong gi rtsa nas chu'i rgyun dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi sems dbu ma'i lam
translated: The bodhicitta, which is like a stream of water, should be visualized as flowing through the central channel from the seventy-two thousand channels to the tip of the vajra.üîΩThe five signs, such as the mirage, should be visualized in advance.üîΩThe experience of supreme joy should be experienced in the bodhicitta.

original: nas rdo rje'i rtse mor smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rtags lnga mtshon pa sngon du 'gro bar byang chub kyi sems la mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong zhing de'i mthar byang chub kyi sems las snga ma bzhin du 'od zer dang phyag mtshan dang /üîΩphyag rgya chen po'i gzugs spro zhing /
analyzed: nas rdo rje'i rtse mor smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rtags lnga mtshon pa sngon du 'gro bar byang chub kyi sems la mchog tu dga' ba nyams su myong zhing de'i mthar byang chub kyi sems las snga ma bzhin du 'od zer dang phyag mtshan dang /üîΩphyag rgya chen po'i gzugs spro zhing /
translated: At the end of that, light rays, hand implements, and the form of the great seal should be emanated from the bodhicitta, as before.

original: de rnams gyis 'gro ba'i don byas la slar yang bsdus te de nyid du 'jug par bsam par bya'o zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de rnams gyis 'gro ba'i don byas la slar yang bsdus te de nyid du 'jug par bsam par bya'o zhes bstan to //
translated: One should imagine that they benefit migrating beings and then reabsorb them and enter into that very reality.

original: byang chub kyi sems phyung ba las zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de nyid 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩbu ni rdo rje 'chang chen @182a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems phyung ba las zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de nyid 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul du spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen @182a * //
translated: The phrase arising from the bodhicitta means that one should emanate that very bodhicitta in the form of a mass of light rays as buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: po la ltos pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: po la ltos pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The sons are the five tathagatas, in relation to Great Vajradhara.

original: tsha bo ni de rnams las kyang byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: tsha bo ni de rnams las kyang byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The grandsons are the bodhisattvas who also arise from them.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni rigs kyi yum dang mchod pa'i lha mo dang khro bo'i 'khor lo yang bstan to //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni rigs kyi yum dang mchod pa'i lha mo dang khro bo'i 'khor lo yang bstan to //
translated: The phrase and so forth indicates the consorts of the families, the offering goddesses, and the retinue of wrathful ones.

original: sbas pa'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags kyi chos nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbas pa'o zhes pa ni 'dod chags kyi chos nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word hidden is because the reality of passion is taught.

original: 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs su yin no //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of the yogi who is of the type of passion, and it is in the direction of the perfection stage.üîΩIn order to teach the second subtle yoga of the yogi who is of the type of aversion,

original: zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: zhe sdang gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: he says,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can //
translated: the nature of the Tathagatas,

original: zhes smos pa la sku rdo rje la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi yig 'bru nye bar bsdus pa las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes smos pa la sku rdo rje la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi yig 'bru nye bar bsdus pa las 'byung ngo //
translated: which arises from the collection of the syllables of the three Tathagatas, Body-Vajra and so on.

original: mi shigs par grags pa ste zhes pa ni 'ba' zhig tu sngags kyi thig le brjod du mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi shigs par grags pa ste zhes pa ni 'ba' zhig tu sngags kyi thig le brjod du mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is known as indestructible, because it is not possible to express the mantra drop as mere sound.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rin po che skyed pas so zhes pa ni de las kyang spro ba'i sbyar bas sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rin po che skyed pas so zhes pa ni de las kyang spro ba'i sbyar bas sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the source of the jewel of the Buddhas, because the Buddhas arise from it by the process of emanation.

original: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshad tsam ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs kho na'o //
analyzed: yungs kar gyi 'bru tshad tsam ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs kho na'o //
translated: It is the size of a mustard seed, because it is just the tone of the following.

original: thig le'i gzugs can yin pas so zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thig le'i gzugs can yin pas so zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'i dbyangs kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has the form of a drop, it is the nature of the vowels that follow.

original: snying ga'i padma'i lte bar zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje 'chang gi gnas la'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i padma'i lte bar zhes pa ni thugs rdo rje 'chang gi gnas la'o //
translated: In the center of the heart lotus means in the place of Mind Vajradhara.

original: de la zhen pas ni de la sems rtse gcig pas so //
analyzed: de la zhen pas ni de la sems rtse gcig pas so //
translated: By being attached to that means by the mind being one-pointedly focused on that.

original: de nyid kyi bshad pa ni 'jug pa dang ldang ba dang ; gnas pa dang sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi bshad pa ni 'jug pa dang ldang ba dang ; gnas pa dang sdud pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
translated: The explanation of that is by the yoga of entering, rising, abiding, and gathering.

original: thugs rdo rje 'chang gi yig 'bru 'ba' zhig tu dmigs la /
analyzed: thugs rdo rje 'chang gi yig 'bru 'ba' zhig tu dmigs la /
translated: One focuses on the syllable of Mind Vajradhara alone.

original: de'i cha shas nye bar bsdu zhing srog dang rtsol ba dang me dang mnyam pa'i rlung gsum gyi bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bar du gnas pa'i tshul gsum du gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i cha shas nye bar bsdu zhing srog dang rtsol ba dang me dang mnyam pa'i rlung gsum gyi bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bar du gnas pa'i tshul gsum du gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should abide in the three ways of going, coming, and abiding in between by the characteristic of the activity of the three winds‚Äîlife, exertion, and fire‚Äîgathering the parts of that.

original: sdud pa'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rlung gi gsum po yang sngags kyi thig le de nyid du phyin nas bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdud pa'i rnal 'byor zhes pa ni rlung gi gsum po yang sngags kyi thig le de nyid du phyin nas bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: The yoga of gathering is that the three winds also arrive at that drop of mantra and are gathered there.

original: snga ma bzhin du brtan pa'i rtags mthong ba sngon du 'gro bas spro bar bya'o zhes bya bas rtag pa ste zhes ston te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du brtan pa'i rtags mthong ba sngon du 'gro bas spro bar bya'o zhes bya bas rtag pa ste zhes ston te /
translated: This shows the constant.

original: thig le nye bar sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: thig le nye bar sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The clear light, which has the characteristic of the gathering of the drop.

original: mi shigs pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi sa bon gyi thig le'o //
analyzed: mi shigs pa zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi sa bon gyi thig le'o //
translated: The indestructible is the drop, the seed of Vajradhara.

original: de la rin po che ste 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de la rin po che ste 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The jewel is the clear light.

original: de rtogs shing mngon du byas la des yang dag par sbyor ba ni spro ba'i dus su yang de nyid du lhag par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: de rtogs shing mngon du byas la des yang dag par sbyor ba ni spro ba'i dus su yang de nyid du lhag par mos par bya'o //
translated: Having realized that, having manifested it, one should be devoted to that very thing at the time of radiating.

original: 'od zer gyi tshogs zhes pa la kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de las yongs @182b su brtags te g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi tshogs zhes pa la kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de las yongs @182b su brtags te g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas me'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The assembly of light rays is the mandala endowed with the five colors. From that, one should imagine the assembly of Tathagatas radiating by way of the division of the right and so forth, by way of the sequence of the mandala of fire and so forth. This is the meaning.

original: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mthar thug pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The ultimate is the clear light.

original: thugs kyi bzlas pa'i 'ong gsal ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thugs kyi bzlas pa'i 'ong gsal ba'i de kho na nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to teach the reality of the mental recitation.

original: 'dir ni bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the condensed meaning:üîΩThe yogƒ´ of Hatred Vajra, having arranged the three syllables on the head, etc., should recite them by the process of entering, rising, etc., and should enter the seed syllable of Speech Vajra,

original: zhe sdang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas mgo bo la sogs par yi ge gsum bkod la 'jug pa dang ldang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de nyid bzla zhing kun rdzob kyi phyogs 'dor bar bya ba yin pas sku rdo rje'i yig 'bru gsung rdo rje'i sa bonüîΩla 'jug cing /
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas mgo bo la sogs par yi ge gsum bkod la 'jug pa dang ldang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de nyid bzla zhing kun rdzob kyi phyogs 'dor bar bya ba yin pas sku rdo rje'i yig 'bru gsung rdo rje'i sa bon la 'jug cing /
translated: which is the seed syllable of Body Vajra,

original: de'i cha rnams kyang snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje'i yi ge 'bru'i thig le la bsdus te /
analyzed: de'i cha rnams kyang snying ga'i padma la gnas pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje'i yi ge 'bru'i thig le la bsdus te /
translated: and the parts of that into the drop of the syllable of Mind Vajra, which is located in the heart lotus.

original: de'i cha rnams kyang de nyid du thim la 'od gsal ba nyid du dmigs nas /
analyzed: de'i cha rnams kyang de nyid du thim la 'od gsal ba nyid du dmigs nas /
translated: And the parts of that also dissolve into that, and one should visualize just the clear light.

original: de las spros pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i 'od zer gyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil khyab par byas la //
analyzed: de las spros pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i 'od zer gyi sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dkyil khyab par byas la //
translated: And having emanated the ma·πá·∏çala of the four, one should pervade the realm of space with the assembly of tathƒÅgatas by means of the light rays.

original: de rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don byas te de nyid du 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don byas te de nyid du 'jug par bya'o zhes pa ni /
translated: Having performed the welfare of transmigrators in that way, one should enter into that very reality.

original: zhe sdang gyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
analyzed: zhe sdang gyi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan to //
translated: This is the teaching of the subtle yoga for the yogƒ´ of the angry type.

original: de ltar phra mo'i rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum las bskyed pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa'i rnam pa drug ni gcig yin te rigs drug las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar phra mo'i rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum las bskyed pa'i rim pa gtso bor gyur pa'i rnam pa drug ni gcig yin te rigs drug las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, from among the three types of subtle yoga, the six types that are primarily the stage of generation are one, because they arise from the six families.

original: gnyis pa dang gsum pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi rigs can dag la bstan to //
analyzed: gnyis pa dang gsum pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi rigs can dag la bstan to //
translated: The second and third are taught for the yogƒ´ of the stage of completion who is of the angry and desirous types, respectively.

original: gti mug gi rigs can dag la ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs can dag la ni 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: For those of the deluded type, it will be explained below.

original: da ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: da ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the yoga and subsequent yoga that are branches of the stage of generation of Vairocana and so on, which were previously explained, he says Vairocana, and so on.

original: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas zhes pa ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas zhes pa ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
translated: Having first visualized reality, means having first meditated on the ultimate mandala.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la zhes pa ni yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod pa yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngar bshad pa'i padma
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la zhes pa ni yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i padma dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng du yi ge gsum bkod pa yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngar bshad pa'i padma
translated: Having meditated on the moon mandala, means having arranged the three syllables on the seat of lotus, moon, and sun generated from the transformation of the three syllables, and having generated the moon mandala from the transformation of the arrangement of the three syllables, and having dissolved the previously explained lotus, etc.

original: la sogs pa thim zhing ro gcig par byas la chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyis brtan par byas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: la sogs pa thim zhing ro gcig par byas la chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyis brtan par byas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: into it and made them of one taste, the meaning of the phrase moon mandala is a moon mandala stabilized by the mantra of the realm of reality.

original: @183a * // de'i steng du 'khor lo bsams te zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la yi ge gsum bkod cing yi ge gnyis yi ge aom la zhugs te /

translated: Having visualized the wheel on top of that, means having arranged the three syllables on that very moon mandala, and having caused the two syllables to enter into the syllable Om.

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba byas la de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i kha dog dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba byas la de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i kha dog dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: The meaning is that one should meditate on a white wheel with twelve spokes, arisen from the transformation of those light rays.

original: / bsgom mo zhes pa ni 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i dbus su yang yi ge aom bkod la /
analyzed: / bsgom mo zhes pa ni 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i dbus su yang yi ge aom bkod la /
translated: ‚Äú One should meditate‚Äù means that one should also place the syllable O·πÄ in the center of the hub of that wheel,

original: spro ba dang bsdu ba byas te zla ba dang 'khor lo dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba byas te zla ba dang 'khor lo dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and having caused the emanation and gathering of light rays, one should meditate on the Blessed One Vairocana arisen from the transformation of the moon, wheel, and seed-syllable.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po'i bskyed pa'i rim pa ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po'i bskyed pa'i rim pa ston to //
translated: Thus, by the words ‚Äúand so forth,‚Äù the generation process of the four TathƒÅgatas is taught.

original: snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dmigs la de'i steng du yi ge gsum dgod cing yi ge gnyis rang gi sa bon la zhugs
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dmigs la de'i steng du yi ge gsum dgod cing yi ge gnyis rang gi sa bon la zhugs
translated: The practitioner of AmitƒÅbha, beginning with the exorcism of obstacles up to the mantra of the realm of phenomena, visualizes one‚Äôs mind as a moon disk and arranges the three syllables upon it, and the two syllables enter into one‚Äôs seed syllable.

original: te // de yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i kha dog dmar po padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
analyzed: te // de yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i kha dog dmar po padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
translated: That completely transforms into an eight-petaled lotus, the color of the deity.

original: de'i lte bar yang yig 'bru de nyid dgod cing zla ba dang padma dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i lte bar yang yig 'bru de nyid dgod cing zla ba dang padma dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In its center, one should also arrange that very syllable, and from the complete transformation of the moon, lotus, and syllable, one should meditate on the Bhagavat AmitƒÅbha.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar lhag par mos la /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar lhag par mos la /
translated: The practitioner of Ratnasa·πÉbhava, beginning with the exorcism of obstacles up to the mantra of the realm of phenomena, should imagine one‚Äôs mind as a moon disk.

original: de'i steng du yi ge gsum sva dang bcas par dgod cing yi ge gsum yang rang gi sa bon la dgod de /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge gsum sva dang bcas par dgod cing yi ge gsum yang rang gi sa bon la dgod de /
translated: On top of that, one should arrange the three syllables together with svƒÅ, and also the three syllables are arranged on their own seed.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las kha dog ser po zung drug pa'i rin po che bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las kha dog ser po zung drug pa'i rin po che bsgoms la /
translated: From that transformation, one should meditate on a six-pair-colored jewel.

original: de las sa bon de nyid dgod de zla ba dang rin po che dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las sa bon de nyid dgod de zla ba dang rin po che dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya'o //
translated: From that, one should arrange that very seed. From the transformation of the moon, jewel, and syllable, one should meditate on the generation of BhagavƒÅn Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te /
translated: The practitioner of Amoghasiddhi, beginning with the expulsion of obstructors,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bsgoms la /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bsgoms la /
translated: up to the mantra of the realm of phenomena, should meditate on one‚Äôs mind as similar to a moon ma·πá·∏çala.

original: yi ge gsum ha dang bcas par dgod de /
analyzed: yi ge gsum ha dang bcas par dgod de /
translated: One should arrange the three syllables together with ha.

original: yi ge gsum yang rang gi sa bon la 'jug cing spro ba dang bsdu bar byas te /
analyzed: yi ge gsum yang rang gi sa bon la 'jug cing spro ba dang bsdu bar byas te /

analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i ral gri bsgoms la /
translated: From that transformation, one should meditate on the generation of a sword.

original: de'i chang zung la yig 'bru de nyid dgod de /
analyzed: de'i chang zung la yig 'bru de nyid dgod de /
translated: One should place that very syllable on the handle of that,

original: zla ba dang ral @183b gri dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das don yod grub par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang ral @183b gri dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das don yod grub par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and meditate on the Blessed One Amoghasiddhi arisen from the transformation of the moon, sword, and seed.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bgegs bskrad pa nas brtsams te /
translated: The practitioner of Ak·π£obhya, beginning with the expulsion of obstacles,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bsgoms la /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags kyi bar du rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bsgoms la /
translated: should meditate on his mind as a moon disk, up to the mantra of the realm of phenomena.

original: de'i steng du yi ge gsum dgod cing yi ge gnyis thugs kyi rdo rje'i sa bon la zhugs te /
analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge gsum dgod cing yi ge gnyis thugs kyi rdo rje'i sa bon la zhugs te /
translated: He should place the three syllables on that, and the two syllables should enter into the seed of Cittavajra.

analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu ba byas la de yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsgoms la /

analyzed: de nyid kyi dbus kyi rtse mor yig 'bru de nyid dgod cing zla ba dang rdo rje dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He should place that very syllable on the central prong of that, and meditate on the Blessed One Ak·π£obhya arisen from the transformation of the moon, vajra, and seed.

analyzed: de tsam gyis dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyogs gcig par gyur pa'i rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor bstan to //
translated: Just that much is the yoga and subsequent yoga which are one part of the samadhi of the first union.

original: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: de yang nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: And that is just an illustration,

original: phyag rgya legs par sbyang ba sngon du 'gro bar dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya legs par sbyang ba sngon du 'gro bar dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: for one should also cultivate the samadhi of the supreme victor mandala, preceded by the thorough training in the seal.üîΩThe yoga of the subtle part of the supreme victor of action is stated in his own words.

original: las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi phyogs gcig phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni rang gi tshig gis gsungs so zhes ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i sgoüîΩnas bstan to //
analyzed: las kyi rgyal ba mchog gi phyogs gcig phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni rang gi tshig gis gsungs so zhes ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i sgo nas bstan to //
translated: Thus, the creation stage which has the nature of the three samadhis is taught, and the perfection stage is taught by way of the divisions of vajra repetition and so forth.

original: de ltar rim pa gnyis ni gsal bar bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa gnyis ni gsal bar bshad pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the two stages are clearly explained.

original: de ltar padma yongs su gyur pa las zhes pa ni zla ba dang padma dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ltar padma yongs su gyur pa las zhes pa ni zla ba dang padma dang yig 'bru yongs su gyur pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúfrom the complete transformation of the lotus‚Äù means from the complete transformation of the moon, lotus, and seed-syllable.

original: padma r'a ga'i 'od can ni dbang gi las la nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: padma r'a ga'i 'od can ni dbang gi las la nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the radiance of a ruby‚Äù is because of being able to perform the action of controlling.

original: kha dog ser po ni rgyas pa'i las la nus pa'i phyir te gser bzhin no //
analyzed: kha dog ser po ni rgyas pa'i las la nus pa'i phyir te gser bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúYellow‚Äù is because of being able to perform the action of increasing, like gold.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pas ral gri 'am rang gi gzugs so //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sgra ji bzhin ma yin pas ral gri 'am rang gi gzugs so //
translated: ‚ÄúA crossed vajra‚Äù is not literal, so it is a sword or its form.

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba der gnas pa ni zhes pa ni de'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba der gnas pa ni zhes pa ni de'i kha dog dang ldan pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúResiding there, like space‚Äù means having its color.

original: nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i don to zhes pa ni de nyid kyi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'i don to zhes pa ni de nyid kyi bshad pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the color of space‚Äù is the explanation of that.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub pas mtshon pa'i zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i nang nas thugs rdo rje nyid gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub pas mtshon pa'i zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i nang nas thugs rdo rje nyid gtso bo yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúIndicated by the accomplishment of body, speech, and mind‚Äù means that among the vajras of body, speech, and mind, the mind vajra is the principal one.

original: lus dang ngag gi rtsa ba de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi rtsa ba de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is the root of body and speech.

original: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa ni de bskyed pa ni rgyur gyur pa yi ge gsum mo //üîΩdes mtshon pa ni thugs rdo rje 'chang nyid de 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi thugs la yi ge gsum @184a * //
analyzed: de bas na sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa ni de bskyed pa ni rgyur gyur pa yi ge gsum mo // des mtshon pa ni thugs rdo rje 'chang nyid de 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyi thugs la yi ge gsum @184a * //
translated: Therefore, the practice of body, speech, and mind is the generation of that, which is the cause, the three syllables.

original: byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The illustration of that is the mind of Vajradhara, because the three syllables arise from the mind, which is the nature of clear light.

original: de dang 'dra ba bcom ldan 'das ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba bcom ldan 'das ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn who is like that is Ak·π£obhya.

original: de'i rdo rje las byung ba'o zhes pa ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang yig 'bru dang de'i bdag nyid kyi nga rgyal las bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de'i rdo rje las byung ba'o zhes pa ni zla ba dang rdo rje dang yig 'bru dang de'i bdag nyid kyi nga rgyal las bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from his vajra‚Äù means generated from the moon, vajra, syllable, and pride of its nature, is what is meant.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zhes pa la rang gi go 'phang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zhes pa la rang gi go 'phang nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOmniscience‚Äù is one‚Äôs own state, which is the abandonment of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience, the mirror-like pristine consciousness, and so on.

original: sems can rnams dmigs shing zhes pa ni sems can rnams la ster bar byed pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can rnams dmigs shing zhes pa ni sems can rnams la ster bar byed pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: ‚ÄúObserving sentient beings‚Äù is the bestowal upon sentient beings of the BhagavƒÅn Vairocana, and so on.

original: ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan te de ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan te de ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which has the nature of that is so-called. This is the teaching of the samadhi of the supreme victor mandala by way of summary, because it is the nature of the performance of the welfare of sentient beings.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so zhes pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so zhes pa ni rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the Tathagatas, because they possess the indestructible wisdom.

original: 'dus pa mdzad pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dus pa mdzad pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag po nyid kyis so //
translated: The performance of the assembly is by the nature of the lord of the five Tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi re re la lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi re re la lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Each of those has a mandala of thirty-two deities.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bsdus par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis ni lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bsdus par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Thus, the thirty-two mandalas are summarized as having the nature of thirty-two deities.

original: drang ba'i don ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drang ba'i don ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The provisional meaning is for the sake of teaching the creation stage.

original: gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o zhes smos pa la //
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o zhes smos pa la //
translated: In order to teach the subtle yoga of the yogi who is of the deluded type, he says, ‚Äúthe clear light.‚Äù

original: lus rnam par dben pa'i mthar chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lus rnam par dben pa'i mthar chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: At the end of the body isolation, the reality called the clear light that is the essence of the gnosis of the ultimate dimension is taught.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de mi shigs pa'o zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po mi shigs pa zhes bya'o//
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de mi shigs pa'o zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po mi shigs pa zhes bya'o//
translated: ‚Äú In the middle of that, the moon mandala that abides there is the indestructible,‚Äù meaning that the first letter of the blazing moon mandala is called the indestructible.

original: rab du byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab du byed pa las kyang /
translated: The Vajra Wisdom Compendium says:

original: thung du lus ngag yin te //
analyzed: thung du lus ngag yin te //
translated: The short is body and speech,

original: gcig min du ma ma yin no //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gcig min du ma ma yin no // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: not one, not many.

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las /
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan las /
translated: The Ornament of the Vajra Realm says:

original: 'bar zhing mar me dang mtshungs pa'i //
analyzed: 'bar zhing mar me dang mtshungs pa'i //
translated: Blazing like a butter lamp,

original: snying ga'i dbus na mi shigs pa //
analyzed: snying ga'i dbus na mi shigs pa //
translated: in the middle of the heart, the indestructible,

original: mi 'gyur padma phra ba ste //
analyzed: mi 'gyur padma phra ba ste //
translated: the subtle unchanging lotus,

original: aa yig gtso bo mchog yin no //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo ;
analyzed: aa yig gtso bo mchog yin no //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo ;
translated: the supreme principal letter A.

original: / sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang //
analyzed: / sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang //
translated: And in the Net of Illusory Manifestations:

original: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
analyzed: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
translated: A is the supreme of all syllables, the great meaning, the holy syllable.

original: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
analyzed: khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med //
translated: It arises from within, unborn.

original: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
analyzed: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
translated: It is free from verbal expression.

original: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed /üîΩces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed / ces 'byung ngo //
translated: It is the supreme cause of all expressions, it illuminates all words.

original: mi shigs pa la nges par 'byung ba'i @184b zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i yi ge aa las 'byung zhing de'i sprul pa las bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: mi shigs pa la nges par 'byung ba'i @184b zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'i yi ge aa las 'byung zhing de'i sprul pa las bskyed pa'o //
translated: The emergence of the syllable a from the indestructible is the emergence of the syllable a from the wheel of the sphere of reality with eight spokes, and it is generated from the emanation of that.

original: chu'i dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kha dog dkar ba ni zhes pa la snying gar gnas pa'i phyir dang / chu'i khams kha dog dkar ba'i phyir dang / zhi ba'i las la brtson pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chu'i dkyil 'khor te mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kha dog dkar ba ni zhes pa la snying gar gnas pa'i phyir dang / chu'i khams kha dog dkar ba'i phyir dang / zhi ba'i las la brtson pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The water ma·πá·∏çala, which is the essence of Ak·π£obhya, is white, because it is located at the heart, because the water element is white, and because it is dedicated to the activity of pacification.

original: dal bar rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du chu ni drag par rgyu ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dal bar rgyu ba'i phyir ro zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du chu ni drag par rgyu ba ma yin te /
translated: It is slow moving, because water does not move violently, like the wind ma·πá·∏çala.

original: 'on kyang rang bzhin gyi chu'i khams dal bar rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang rang bzhin gyi chu'i khams dal bar rgyu ba ste /
translated: However, the water element, which is of the nature of fluidity, moves slowly.

original: steng dang 'og gi gnas kyi 'brel pas de rnams kyi myur ba dang dman pa dang bar ma rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi gnas kyi 'brel pas de rnams kyi myur ba dang dman pa dang bar ma rgyu ba yin te /
translated: Because of the connection with the upper and lower locations, it moves quickly, slowly, and moderately,

original: chu bo dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chu bo dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like rivers and oceans, etc.üîΩThe fire ma·πá·∏çala is red in color.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar po'o zhes pa la de nyid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba gru gsum pa lkog mar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar po'o zhes pa la de nyid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba gru gsum pa lkog mar gnas pa'o //
translated: Arisen from its own nature, it is triangular, and located in the throat.

original: g-yas nas 'byung ba zhes pa ni sna khung g-yas pa las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: g-yas nas 'byung ba zhes pa ni sna khung g-yas pa las 'byung ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from the right‚Äù means arisen from the right nostril.üîΩThe color of the fire ma·πá·∏çala is red.

original: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi kha dog ni dmar po nyid do / dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sa'i dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi kha dog ni dmar po nyid do / dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni sa'i dkyil 'khor te //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the great lord is the ma·πá·∏çala of earth.

original: de nyid kyang yi ge lam las byung ba gsang ba'i gnas su gru bzhi par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyang yi ge lam las byung ba gsang ba'i gnas su gru bzhi par gnas pa'o //
translated: Arisen from the syllable la·πÉ, it is located in the secret place as a square.

original: gnyi ga las 'byung bar zhes pa ni sna khung gnyi ga las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gnyi ga las 'byung bar zhes pa ni sna khung gnyi ga las 'byung ngo //
translated: ‚ÄúArisen from both‚Äù means arisen from both nostrils.

original: sa'i dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po ste gser gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa'i dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po ste gser gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The circle of earth is yellow in color, because it is the nature of gold.

original: de yang dal bus dman par rgyu ba yin te sa gzhi ni snod kyi 'jig rten yin pas brtan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang dal bus dman par rgyu ba yin te sa gzhi ni snod kyi 'jig rten yin pas brtan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, it moves slowly and weakly, because the surface of the earth is the container world, and is stable.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor te zhes pa ni de nyid kyi yi ge yam las byung ba gzhu'i dbyibs can lte bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor te zhes pa ni de nyid kyi yi ge yam las byung ba gzhu'i dbyibs can lte bar gnas pa'o //
translated: The circle of wind, which arises from the syllable yam, is shaped like a bow, and is located at the navel.

original: kha dog nag po zhes pa rlung ni ngo bo nyid kyis kha dog sngo ba yin pas so //
analyzed: kha dog nag po zhes pa rlung ni ngo bo nyid kyis kha dog sngo ba yin pas so //
translated: It is black in color, because wind is naturally blue in color.

original: g-yon nas rgyu ba yin par zhes pa ni sna khung g-yon pa las rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon nas rgyu ba yin par zhes pa ni sna khung g-yon pa las rgyu ba'o //
translated: It moves from the left, that is, it moves from the left nostril.

original: yin par shes par bya ste zhes pa ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yin par shes par bya ste zhes pa ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: It should be known, that is, it should be imagined.

original: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'od zer bzhi'i rab tu rgyu ba zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'od zer bzhi'i rab tu rgyu ba zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Those are the movements of the four light rays, which are the nature of the Tathagata, that is, the nature of Akshobhya and so forth.

original: de ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: This is just an illustration.

original: gos dkar mo la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang / sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi dang / zhi ba la sogs pa phrin las bzhi dang / dkar po la sogs pa 'od zer 'byung ba /üîΩg-yas dang g-yon dang gnyi ga dang dal bus rgyu ba dang / wa la sogs pa'i yi ge las byung ba dang gru @185a * //
analyzed: gos dkar mo la sogs pa lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin dang / sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi dang / zhi ba la sogs pa phrin las bzhi dang / dkar po la sogs pa 'od zer 'byung ba / g-yas dang g-yon dang gnyi ga dang dal bus rgyu ba dang / wa la sogs pa'i yi ge las byung ba dang gru @185a * //
translated: One should know that the four goddesses such as PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´ are of the nature of the four goddesses, and that the four elements such as earth, the four activities such as pacification, the light rays such as white,

original: gsum dang zlum po dang gzhu'i dbyibs dang gru bzhi dang kha dog dmar po la sogs pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum dang zlum po dang gzhu'i dbyibs dang gru bzhi dang kha dog dmar po la sogs pa dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
translated: the right, left, both, and slow movements, the arising from the letters such as va, the triangular, circular, bow-shaped, square, and red color, and so on.

original: bshad pa yin no zhes pa ni sdud pa pos bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa yin no zhes pa ni sdud pa pos bshad pa'o //
translated: The phrase explained refers to the explanation by the compiler.

original: sku la sogs pa bskyed pas na //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa bskyed pas na //
translated: Because it generates the body and so on,

original: zhes pa ni ' jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ' jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi sku'i rang bzhin gyi sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: it is called the perfection of the body, speech, and mind of the transcendent wisdom body.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba las bzhengs te zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba las bzhengs te zhes smos te /
translated: In order to teach just that, it arises from clear light.

original: rim pa bzhi pas thob pa'i de kho na nyid las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rim pa bzhi pas thob pa'i de kho na nyid las 'byung ba'o //
translated: It arises from the reality attained by the fourth stage.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Having the nature of the two realities means having the nature of the sphere of nonabiding nirvana.

original: lha'i dkyil 'khor yin par shes par bya'o zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i dkyil 'khor yin par shes par bya'o zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should know the divine mandala means one should cultivate the assembly of Tathagatas such as Akshobhya.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob par 'dod pa'i zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas zhes tshig lhag ma'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob par 'dod pa'i zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas zhes tshig lhag ma'o //
translated: One who desires to attain the state of omniscience means the yogi, the remainder of the sentence.

original: de ni byed pa'i drug pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni byed pa'i drug pa yin no //
translated: This is the sixth case of the agent.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The intention is as follows.

original: re zhig dang po'i rnal 'byor pas cig car du ye shes kyi sku dmigs la /
analyzed: re zhig dang po'i rnal 'byor pas cig car du ye shes kyi sku dmigs la /
translated: First, the beginner yogi simultaneously visualizes the wisdom body.

original: lte ba'i phyogs su rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge las ya ra la wa sprul te /
analyzed: lte ba'i phyogs su rtsibs brgyad pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo'i yi ge las ya ra la wa sprul te /
translated: At the navel, from the syllables of the dharma-dhƒÅtu cakra with eight spokes, the syllables ya ra la wa emanate.

original: de dag yongs su gyur pa las lkog ma la sogs pa'i gnas bzhi las gru gsum dang zlum po dang zla gam gru bzhi pa'i me dang chu dang rlung dang sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bsgoms la //
analyzed: de dag yongs su gyur pa las lkog ma la sogs pa'i gnas bzhi las gru gsum dang zlum po dang zla gam gru bzhi pa'i me dang chu dang rlung dang sa'i dkyil 'khor rnams bsgoms la //
translated: Those completely transform into the four places such as the throat and so on, where one meditates on the fire, water, wind, and earth mandalas, which are triangular, round, semicircular, and square.

original: de rnams re re la yi ge gsum dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bar 'jug pa la sogs pa gsum gyi rim pas bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams re re la yi ge gsum dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bar 'jug pa la sogs pa gsum gyi rim pas bzlas par bya ste /
translated: One should recite the three seed syllables in each of those, preceded by visualization, in the sequence of the three, entry and so on.

original: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los phra mo'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor los phra mo'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the subtle yoga with the wheel of light rays that arise from those.

original: de'i rim pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor la kha dog dmar po 'od zer sna khung g-yas pa las 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par dbang gi las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor la kha dog dmar po 'od zer sna khung g-yas pa las 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par dbang gi las 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The procedure is as follows: On the fire mandala, the color is red, the light rays emerge from the right nostril, and if one is occupied with the tip of the nose for half a period, at that time the yogi/nƒ´ will effortlessly accomplish the activity of controlling.

original: de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor las kha dog ljang ser sna bug g-yon pa nas 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par dgug pa dang mngon spyod dag grub po //
analyzed: de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor las kha dog ljang ser sna bug g-yon pa nas 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par dgug pa dang mngon spyod dag grub po //
translated: Likewise, if the green-yellow light from the wind ma·πá·∏çala arises from the left nostril and reaches the tip of the nose on the face at the time of the half-periods, then at that time the yogin‚Äôs summoning and destroying are accomplished without effort.

original: de bzhin du sa'i dkyil 'khor @185b kha dog ser po sna khung gnyis ka las 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du sa'i dkyil 'khor @185b kha dog ser po sna khung gnyis ka las 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na /
translated: Likewise, if the yellow light from the earth ma·πá·∏çala arises from both nostrils and reaches the tip of the nose on the face at the time of the half-periods,

original: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par rgyas pa'i las grub bo //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par rgyas pa'i las grub bo //
translated: then at that time the yogin‚Äôs increasing activity is accomplished without effort.

original: de bzhin du chu'i dkyil 'khor las gnyi ga las byung ba'i kha dog dkar po 'od zer 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du chu'i dkyil 'khor las gnyi ga las byung ba'i kha dog dkar po 'od zer 'byung zhing gdong gi sna rtser thun phyed phyed kyi dus su zin na /
translated: Likewise, if the white light arising from both [nostrils] from the water ma·πá·∏çala reaches the tip of the nose on the face at the time of the half-periods,

original: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par zhi ba'i las grub bo //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas 'bad rtsol med par zhi ba'i las grub bo //
translated: then at that time the yogin‚Äôs pacifying activity is accomplished without effort.

original: 'od zer gyi thig le de las snga ma bzhin du brtan pa'i rtags mthong ba sngon du 'gro bar 'od zer dang phyag mtshan dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po spro zhing slar yang dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'jug pa ni //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi thig le de las snga ma bzhin du brtan pa'i rtags mthong ba sngon du 'gro bar 'od zer dang phyag mtshan dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po spro zhing slar yang dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'jug pa ni //
translated: From that drop of light rays, as before, one should emanate the light rays, hand implements, and great mudras of the tathagatas, and again enter into that very mandala.

original: gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the subtle yoga of a yogin of the deluded type.

original: 'di dang snga ma gnyis bsdus te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum bstan to //
analyzed: 'di dang snga ma gnyis bsdus te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sku rdo rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum bstan to //
translated: These two, the previous one and this one, are combined, and the three types of subtle yoga are taught by the division of the yoga of the stage of completion into the vajra body and so forth.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan dang don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan dang don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis kyang //
translated: Yogins of Ratnasa·πÉbhava and Amoghasiddhi

original: smin mtshams dang lte ba'i dbus su thig le tsam bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: smin mtshams dang lte ba'i dbus su thig le tsam bsgom par bya'o //
translated: should meditate on just a drop at the point between the eyebrows and at the navel.

original: de la gsang ba'i gnas kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le gang yin ba de nyid thur du sel ba'i rlung bzlog nas gyen du 'dren par bsgom par bya'o zhes bla ma'i man ngag go //
analyzed: de la gsang ba'i gnas kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le gang yin ba de nyid thur du sel ba'i rlung bzlog nas gyen du 'dren par bsgom par bya'o zhes bla ma'i man ngag go //
translated: The esoteric point is that one should meditate on the drop of bodhicitta in the secret place, reversing the downward-voiding wind and drawing it upward.

original: yang na sku'i rigs la sogs pa la bsdus pa'i phyir logs su bsgom par mi bya ste /
analyzed: yang na sku'i rigs la sogs pa la bsdus pa'i phyir logs su bsgom par mi bya ste /

original: gang gi phyir rin chen 'byung ldan ni nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rin chen 'byung ldan ni nga rgyal gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is because Ratnasa·πÉbhava is the nature of pride.

original: nga rgyal yang gti mug las 'byung ba'am zhe sdang las byung ba'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal yang gti mug las 'byung ba'am zhe sdang las byung ba'o //

original: de la gti mug las 'byung na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs la bsdu'o //
analyzed: de la gti mug las 'byung na rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs la bsdu'o //

analyzed: zhe sdang las 'byung na mi bskyod pa'i rigs la bsdu'o //

original: don yod grub pa yang phrag dog gi rang bzhin te phrag dog kyang zhe sdang las 'byung bas na thugs rdo rje'i rigs kyi nang du bsdu'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pa yang phrag dog gi rang bzhin te phrag dog kyang zhe sdang las 'byung bas na thugs rdo rje'i rigs kyi nang du bsdu'o //

original: de'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dag gi phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa gang yin pa de dag ni de nyid rin po che dang don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya zhes gud nas bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dag gi phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa gang yin pa de dag ni de nyid rin po che dang don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya zhes gud nas bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, whatever meditations of the subtle yoga of Vairocana and Akshobhya are, those are to be meditated upon by the yogi/nis of Ratnasa·πÉbhava and Amoghasiddhi, and it is not to be explained otherwise.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyud phyi ma las kyang /

analyzed: gsum du yang ni bstan pa yin // zhes 'byung ngo // rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi tshogs te zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdus pa'o //

analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i sku yin la zhes pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The complete deity body is the meaning of ‚Äúthe generation of the gnosis body by the stage of self-consecration.‚Äù

analyzed: rnam rig tsam ni grub pa ste// rang nus 'dra ba bdag gis ni //

original: de lta bu'i 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge dang po gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis mtshon par bya ba ste /

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis grub pa zhes pa ni /
